meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>public</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji> is going to be <vocabulary>government business</vocabulary>. You have to think of this public as government to know the meaning of this word easily.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
